title: Star Guardian 2017 Fanwork Contest - Winners!
body:
Hey Summoners!

{{sticker:sg-lux}} 

You've blown us away with the breadth of your Star Guardian concepts and artistic skills! With over 200 entries, we've had a huge variety of submissions - cosplay, art, skin designs, fanfiction, knitting, a bullet hell game..and even a physics thesis.

Between your creativity and the sheer variety of entries this has been super difficult to judge, and we had to pick more winners than the 5 we'd planned - we just couldn't help ourselves. 


We're excited to announce the following winners:

Give The Lantern created [**an entire website**](https://feardakez.com/nami/
) for their entry, including process videos and a set of design sketches and wallpapers!
https://i.imgur.com/4eYMvLg.png 

Chikorita
https://i.imgur.com/M27DSD5.jpg
https://i.imgur.com/1TpwN6I.jpg

Zookie
https://i.imgur.com/kDZ8gVr.png
https://i.imgur.com/oO0T251.png 

Qoqi
https://i.imgur.com/CVhnkeq.jpg

Six
https://i.imgur.com/AXlIHPo.jpg
https://i.imgur.com/w6QfA9x.jpg

Sophiaa
https://i.imgur.com/KBaVKDF.jpg

Xenna
https://i.imgur.com/jJywr38.png

CrimsonSeal
https://i.imgur.com/pNAX1Vc.jpg

SPUD Inxanity
https://i.imgur.com/ZRxPjHh.png

LordDong
https://i.imgur.com/w56LwAG.png

[**Determination**](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B9SNw0U2oeBGZWhmTkFyaFN2VlE/view) fanfiction by VerumFortis
[**Starlight**](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/contest-fan-fiction/m4h5pEAo-starlight) fanfiction by Luser


We'd also like to make a special callout for our Honourable Mentions. [**Here is a full gallery**](https://imgur.com/a/KrLhK) of the honourable mentions art, but a list below:
>[**Star Guardian Urgot**](https://i.imgur.com/Rkb82KY.jpg) art by Pokerface
[**Fizz and Aurelion Sol**](https://i.imgur.com/aQU1Kzw.jpg) art by Zaxiadus
[**Star Guardian Udyr**](https://i.imgur.com/nAa4Gs3.png) art by MasterJewdog
[**Star Guardian Sona**](https://i.imgur.com/AJffn0q.jpg) art by Hyoton
[**Star Guardian Xayah and Rakan**](https://i.imgur.com/VZ7B6s1.png) art by GlaciusFrost
[**Star Guardian Ashe**](https://i.imgur.com/8YrnWkG.png) art by Chrystalmeth
[**Star Guardian Sona**](https://i.imgur.com/ieTa8mD.png) art by konoumin
[**Star Guardian Sivir**](https://i.imgur.com/5SnrWx6.jpg) art by Nickz
[**Star Guardian Xayah and Rakan**](https://i.imgur.com/YhrMOzi.png) 3d sculpt by EyeoftheTaiga - and a [video of the model in action](https://www.facebook.com/alexis.oconnor.372/videos/a.812044488960721.1073741834.100004655313230/885649968266839/?type=3&theater;)
[**Star Guardian Bard**](https://i.imgur.com/LuCr08x.jpg) art by Biglittleme
[**Star Guardian Vi**](https://i.imgur.com/stYVGrO.mp4) animation by Splitt
[**Star Guardian Orianna**](https://i.imgur.com/FiIwnce.jpg) art by eBEBY
[**Caitlyn and Vi**](https://i.imgur.com/JXGH2pT.png) art by CamiIle
[**Star Guardian Katarina**](https://i.imgur.com/aoePdNp.jpg) art and [**The Last Star Guardian**](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/contest-fan-fiction/0321qlw8-the-last-star-guardian) by NomiNoo
[**Star Guardian Olaf**](https://i.imgur.com/r1js3Vg.jpg) art by paddy g seig
[**Star Guardian Sona**](https://i.imgur.com/DXiAiaG.jpg) knitted plush by Evangelene
[**Star Guardian Annie**](https://i.imgur.com/C0gcDSg.jpg) art by MLSFan26
[**Star Guardian Aurelion Sol**](https://i.imgur.com/tdxF448.jpg) art by Xynn
[**Star Guardian Annie**](https://i.imgur.com/OG8H5ux.png) art by Tibberz
[**Star Guardian Corki**](https://i.imgur.com/4rr0UES.jpg) art by Slowsnail
[**Star Guardian Kayn**](https://i.imgur.com/Magb0bS.jpg) art by ASCubeY
[**Star Guardian Zed**](https://i.imgur.com/loCgwV0.png) art by mondaywaffles
[**Star Guardian Nami**](https://i.imgur.com/30a6yXh.jpg) art by slykyubi
[**Star Guardian Bard**](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/contest-fan-fiction/iR6zX5KF-star-guardian-bard) fanfiction by kujyouhikari
[**Supernova**](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1u__Csmp61b2rbE3UZH53kAlis0iF_fC5ewv_1J7pyY0/edit?usp=sharing) fanfiction by AriaOwl
[**Star Guardian Zyra**](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/contest-fan-fiction/htJAVzdz-star-guardian-contest) fanfiction by SoleSurvivor
[**Starlight Tides**](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/contest-fan-fiction/qXay0Xl0-starlight-tides-a-star-guardian-contest-entry) fanfiction by Luscious Lilim
[**Star’s Quest**](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B30L_wUc1ppqZ0ZVTFZya0ktYzg/view?usp=sharing) bullet hell game by Bamfudge - he made a GAME FOR THIS CONTEST WHAT CRAZINESS


Winners can expect to see their prizes on their account within a couple of days!


Finally a huge thank you to everyone who submitted an entry! You can find a full gallery of all the visual entries [**here**](http://woobox.com/d3krdi) - and fanfiction entries can be found on our [**Fanfiction Board**](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/contest-fan-fiction) or in a shortlist below!
> [**Physical Modelling of the Impacts of an Astronomical Familiar on Adolescent Subject 20**]](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1f5AroejSMGvmDvsCB2mhv_9XJfVzxWvGWy_9r-yahAQ/edit?usp=sharing) thesis by Little Witch Eve
[**Star Guardian Taliyah**](https://www.artstation.com/artwork/RdqEe) by Sunbean


{{sticker:sg-syndra}} 

We also wanted to call out that each time we run a contest, we find entries that are plagiarised content - you know who you are. While we appreciate that you’re excited by the chance to win a prize, these contests are our way to give back to the incredibly talented creative community. Stealing isn’t cool - and if we catch you, you will be blacklisted from winning prizes in any of our future contests. Don’t do it!

replies.body:
HEEEEY CONGRATS!!! :D
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
thanks! Congrats to you too. I had a feeling you would be on the list. You really put so much effort in, it's amazing!

Well done for the winners and honourable mentions!

I was wondering though, why so many of the same champions are featured in the winners/honourable mentions such as multiple ones of leona/diana/xayah/annie etc...
it would've been nice to see some different champion ideas featured for winners/honourable mentions :o
anyway, here was my submission of star guardian taliyah: [Artstation Link](https://www.artstation.com/artwork/RdqEe)
didnt make the cut but hey maybe next time ^_^
{{sticker:sg-lulu}}

I'd wanted to do a Star Guardian Gnar but ran out of time D: (serves me right for trying to make a game for my major entry haha :/ ) 

That's a great Taliyah though! I love the flappy arm bits :D
AHHH! TALIYAH! That looks fantastic! As a taliyah lover I'd appreciate this so much in game!
I love it!

I love your Taliyah so much. If that was a skin I would buy it so quickly!  The details you put into the outfit suit her so much too. The stars on her sleeves and the gradient colour, the cut of the coat, those  boots and that little see-through cloak! Seriously, amazing job. I really wish I could play that in-game.

Hey Sunbean,

It's definitely a good question! We tried to have variety across champions but also across styles of submission, and with such a high quantity of submissions it was difficult to choose. Ultimately if we had two different interpretations of the same champion that we loved, we didn't want to exclude one of them...but that did lead to a lot of SG Annie, Sona, etc.

Your Taliyah is fantastic, I love that she's dashing across the clouds. <3

{{champion:267}} OMG. I AM ONE OF THE WINNERS! THIS IS SOO RAD!!!{{champion:267}} 

{{sticker:sg-kiko}}
Your Nami page just kept going, and my jaw can only drop so far. D: Congratulations, your work was beautiful!
These contests are obviously judged based on criteria other than quality. You probably shouldn't enter if you're not willing to accept the arbitrary selection process.

> [{quoted}](name=lolth,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=i4JxlQls,comment-id=0005000000000000,timestamp=2017-09-22T08:05:16.616+0000)
>
> These contests are obviously judged based on criteria other than quality. You probably shouldn't enter if you're not willing to accept the arbitrary selection process.

I think the fact that it's arbitrary is the problem.

All art competitions ultimately come down to someone's arbitrary decision. These ones are just a little more chaotic.
Keep doing your own thing, you don't need outside validation if you know your own strength.

> [{quoted}](name=lolth,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=i4JxlQls,comment-id=000500000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-09-22T08:59:37.679+0000)
>
> All art competitions ultimately come down to someone's arbitrary decision. These ones are just a little more chaotic.
> Keep doing your own thing, you don't need outside validation if you know your own strength.

I'm just a little salty I guess.

Just kinda hits hard that your hard work doesn't pay off, y'know?

The website you did was super cool! How did you make it?? Did you have to pay for a server or anything? Cause i'm looking to do character design/ skin design in vce next year as a project, and i really admire how your design was presented!

Sorry for late reply.

Firstly, THANK YOU XD
{{sticker:katarina-love}} 

I made the website/assets, My friend UNNOEN (Take the Lantern) helped with the CSS and he hosted.
Oh that is neat! What Skin?

I really appreciate you taking the time to comment. It is so nice to know that people noticed the effort I put into the submission. <3

Sucks not to be even mentioned after being so excited to see the results u.u 
I drew the Irelia one on the same day you released this contest
https://yarahaddad.deviantart.com/art/Star-Guardian-Irelia-701079371

But yeah congrats to the winners :)

> [{quoted}](name=Yara Greyjoy,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=i4JxlQls,comment-id=0021,timestamp=2017-09-23T07:40:16.496+0000)
>
> Sucks not to be even mentioned after being so excited to see the results u.u 
> I drew the Irelia one on the same day you released this contest
> https://yarahaddad.deviantart.com/art/Star-Guardian-Irelia-701079371
> 
> But yeah congrats to the winners :)

Wow yours is beautiful!! {{sticker:sg-lux}} 
I'm surprised you didn't even get an honourable mention!??
I'm in the same boat though, I was really gutted I didn't get a mention either ;___; I put so much time and effort into my Xayah & Rakan too and thought it turned out really good... 

http://woobox.com/d3krdi/gallery/rIfUtBdwqAI

And since they chose more winners/ honourable mentions I thought I would have a better chance xD 
Oh well, I guess this means we have to try harder for the next art competition!
{{sticker:sg-syndra}}

Oh wow that's an awesome drawing D: 
Sorry to hear that they didn't even mention it ;-; 
*hugs* 
Gl next time ♡

Thank you guys so much for including my Xayah {{champion:498}} and Rakan {{champion:497}} in the honorable mentions. Really enjoyed working on this submission and getting the chance to experiment with digital art. 

Enjoyed looking at all the submissions. They're all glorious. (Viktor {{champion:112}}  would approve)

{{sticker:galio-happy}} 

Would it be alright for me to have the prize sent to my brother's account instead (IGN: Peroroncino)? 

He's been waiting for Blood Moon Jhin to go on discount and it actually turned up in his shop for a real good price.  Was going to gift it to him as an early Christmas present, but then I realized I can't get the discount so this would be the only way.

If it's not possible, that's perfectly fine :D

Hey dude, your Xayah and Rakan design was really cool! Thanks for submitting it :D

I've just updated our list for prizing so that when we issue the prizes in the next couple of days, it'll go to your brother's account. Hope he enjoys his Blood Moon Jhin!

This was the first time we've done an open ended contest, and it was so cool to see everyone's creativity come through in a medium they were passionate in. Thank you for sharing this with us <3

{{sticker:sg-jinx}}

Awesome I was selected as a winner ! I'm glad pixel art was able to compete within other great mediums ^^ 
Great job to everyone who has entered ! and congrats to the winners and honourable mentions <3 

Don't stop the creativity
Your pixel art looks amazing! Congrats

Yay! I'm so glad you liked my 3D sculpt {{champion:497}} {{champion:498}} ! Congrats to everyone who was mentioned! There's so much great stuff in here <3  (not-so-subtle hints we all want more star guardian skins) 
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
your 3d sculpt was awesome! How long did it take you to do?
I took maybe 80ish hours? Took a bit too long haha! Your Aurelion Sol was so cool! I liked all the colours and how he would be the first star <3 Yaaassss
DAMN well all that effort really showed! I wish I could make something as cool as that haha. Glad you liked my aurelion though!

Ah thank you! You can defs do it! I used Zbrush which has a really quick learning curve if you ever wanted to give sculpting a go you'll get the hang of it in no time! <3 Of course! It's so beautifullll <3
Woah, I'm pleasantly surprised my short fic made it into honourable mentions! :")

Congratulations to all the winners! 

I hate to be nitpicky but one of the winners - SPUD inxanity hasn't reimagined any champions, they have used only current champions. 
It is a STUNNING piece of work and I absolutely love it but i thought the rules were to design a new one?
I was doubtful even one fanfic would make it, let alone mine :D
Grats on the win dude, your fanfic was stunning ^^
Yours was pretty fantastic too. Like reading one a ballad or a poem :D

Hey guys! Just wanted to acknowledge - there are a couple of winning entries that feature only the existing Star Guardians. 

Our intent for this contest was that only designs for **new** Star Guardians would be eligible. However I realised too late that our official rules were not specific enough. I didn't want anyone to be punished for my mistake when writing of the rules, so we kept entries featuring existing Guardians in the running. 

This was totally my bad and I'll do better next time!

@Achenar thanks to yourself and the rest of the riot guys for running the competition.

Btw Six is my summer name, I just use zduke on my other media accounts so please don't split the prize. (all on Six please)

I like the sona in Honorable mentions, def's should of been a winner
over what was chosen :/ but congrats to them anyways {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

> ..and even a physics thesis

At least it left an impression ❤

 > Finally a huge thank you to everyone who submitted an entry! You can find a full gallery of all the visual entries here - and fanfiction entries can be found on our Fanfiction Board!

Ummm... I can't find my entry in either the Gallery or the Fan-Fiction Board.

It definitely did, it was fantastic. :D

The gallery isn't coping well with submissions that were links - I'm starting a new list of links in the main post for anyone who's missing. Thank you for letting me know so I can fix it!

Missed out on an honorable mention, but here's mine anyway. Turns out even tho i submitted it, it didn't turn up {{item:3070}} (full image in link). 
https://i.imgur.com/0hUmApk.jpg
 just in case you wanted to know date completed, Sep 2 2017.
Honorable Mentions again... {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
Your Leona design was beautiful, and I loved the approach you took to all the champion skills. Congratulations! :D
Thanks so much! I'm glad you like it (:
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

holy shit those are GOOD.

Genuinely blown away by the quality.
